## Plotting a mathematical function

```{r} 
# 1st plot 
curve(expr = sin(3*pi*x))

# 2nd set of plots 
curve(expr = sin(3*pi*x), from = 0, to = 2, col = "blue", 
      xlab = "x", ylab = "f(x)", main = "curve")

curve(expr = cos(3*pi*x), add = TRUE, col = "red", lty = 2) 
abline(h = 0, lty = 2)

# add legend 
legend("bottomleft", c("sin", "cos"), text.col = c("blue", "red"), lty = 1:2) 
```
